name: Infinite Space Saga: Spin So Far In Space
name_original: Infinite Space Saga: Spin So Far In Space
description:
This game was made for the GMTK jam 2019 in two days.

you are on a mission to obtain the migratide shard  on the outer space filled with many danger in order to save mankind from outer space invansion. in order to be able to go there you must use the mighty falco2000  one of the most powerfull spaceship that ever been created by mankind.there only one problem...

the creator of this ship is somehow to stupid to actually make this plane to turn like a normal plane does, so you can only spin to change your direction. using this barely fuctioning plane you must succesfully complete your mission to save the world.

control :

  • enter = pause the game.
  • space = move, stop, spin, shot, select (basically everything else).
  • arrow key = control all the menu option.
